name: insistence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an occasion when you demand something and refuse to accept opposition, or when you say firmly that something is true: insistence on Insistence on better working conditions by the union has resulted in fewer employee absences.at someone's insistence At her father's insistence, Amelia's been moved into a new class. [ + that ] Her insistence that she should have the best room annoyed everyone. He admits that he works with such insistency that he often irritates even his own colleagues.
